data.name: Illustris Demo
data.detailed_description:
A foreign civilisation sent their fleet from the other end of this galaxy to exterminate humanity. Pilot the VELOX starfighter, the newest invention from Doctor Dysnomia, to defend planets and to investigate more information about the enemy's supreme leader called "Illustris".

Blabla

  • Bla 1
  • Bla 2
data.about_the_game:
A foreign civilisation sent their fleet from the other end of this galaxy to exterminate humanity. Pilot the VELOX starfighter, the newest invention from Doctor Dysnomia, to defend planets and to investigate more information about the enemy's supreme leader called "Illustris".

Blabla

  • Bla 1
  • Bla 2
data.short_description: A 2D Top-Down game taking place in space. Experience fast paced combat, solve physics based puzzles and travel the whole galaxy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any NVIDIA or AMD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
